age.title: Young company
age.message: The company is less than 5 years old. Our analysis shows that the risk is higher on companies that are less than 5 years old. The credit score has been affected negatively.
age.description: Warning of higher risk if the company is started within 5 years.

industry_risk.title: Industry risk
industry_risk.message: The company is in an industry with low bankruptcy risk.
industry_risk.description: The information is available if the company is in an industry with high or low bankruptcy risk.

address.title: Change of address
address.message: This company has changed address within the last 3 years.
address.description: The company have changed address within the last 3 years.

change_in_management.title: Changes in management
change_in_management.message: This company had changes in the management and/or the board within the last year.
change_in_management.description: There have been many changes in the management and/or the board within the last year.

change_in_employees.title: Change in number of employees
change_in_employees.message: Number of employees has increased the last 3 years.
change_in_employees.description: Number of employees has consistently changed over the last 3 years.

three_years_profitloss.title: Profit or loss streak
three_years_profitloss.message: This company has had losses the past 3 years.

intangible_assets.title: Large proportion of intangible assets
intangible_assets.message: Intangible assets represents more than 50% of the total equity which may mean a higher financial risk.
intangible_assets.description: Warning if the value of intellectual property represents over 50% of equity in the company. This is a potentially risk factor.

type_of_auditor_assistance.title: Level of audit
type_of_auditor_assistance.message: The latest financial statement have been audited by a registered auditor.
type_of_auditor_assistance.description: Warning about the level of involvement from an auditor in the creation of the financial statement.

connected_bankruptcies.title: Analysis of bankruptcies
connected_bankruptcies.message: We found 2 bankruptcies or enforced closures among the people related to this company. It did not affect the overall credit score.
connected_bankruptcies.description: Amount of historical bankruptcies with the people associated with the company (executives, board of directors etc.).

return_on_assets.title: Return on assets
return_on_assets.message: The company is within the bottom 10% of return on assets in its industry.
return_on_assets.description: Highlights if the return on assets is within the top or bottom 10% among the company industry.

politically_exposed_person.title: Politically exposed person
politically_exposed_person.message: This company has politically exposed persons among management or owners.
politically_exposed_person.description: Companies and persons, who are subject to the Danish money laundering Act, must be able to determine if their customers are politically exposed persons (PEP). Companies/persons must, among other things, conduct strict monitoring of business relationships with PEPs. The detailed rules on this are set out in section 18 of the Money Laundering Act.

change_in_management.title: Changes in management
change_in_management.message: This company had changes in the management and/or the board within the last year.
change_in_management.description: There have been many changes in the management and/or the board within the last year.

health_inspection.title: The Danish Veterinary and Food Administration's smiley scheme
health_inspection.message: All of the company's production units passed their last inspection with no remarks.
health_inspection.description: Information is available if the company is under the supervision of the Danish Veterinary and Food Administration.

profit_loss.title: Changes in profit and loss
profit_loss.message: Profit or loss has increased more than 20% since last year.
profit_loss.description: If profit or losses have a significant trend the last 3 years.

three_years_profitloss.title: Profit or loss streak
three_years_profitloss.message: This company has had profits the past 3 years.

connected_bankruptcies.description: Amount of historical bankruptcies with the people associated with the company (executives, board of directors etc.).

corona_exposure.title: COVID-19 risk
corona_exposure.message: The company is in an industry that is considered to be exposed to falling demand as a result of COVID-19.
corona_exposure.description: The information will appear if the company is at high risk of being affected in relation to. the prevalence of COVID-19.
